DOC.brief_summary: Parkinson 's disease second common neurodegenerative disease affect 1-3 % population 60 year . Recently , non-motor symptom get attention PD management . The pattern PD onset clinical course differ one population another . Many study conduct determine clinical profile PD population worldwide . However , similar study conduct Egypt . Therefore , investigator conduct nation-wide , collaborative , cross sectional study determine pattern Parkinson 's disease onset , clinical course , non-motor symptom among Egyptian population .
DOC.brief_title: Determining Clinical Profile Parkinson 's Disease Among Egyptian Population
DOC.criteria: Patients meet Parkinson 's disease criterion United Kingdom Brain Bank within study centre . Patients vascular Parkinsonism ( history stroke ) Patients treatment induced Parkinsonism Patients history dopaminergic neurotoxin ( 1methyl4phenyl1,2,3,6tetrahydropyridine )
